about.colors_title_2:
TIME TO TURN
EXPERIENCE
INTO ART
about.description_1: Remember the historical streets of European cities, Gothic, eclectic, Baroque and many other styles are combined and exist in harmony with modern reality, and patina complements the ensemble.
about.description_2: Time, the main absolute judge, puts everything on its pedestals showing what is really valuable. The whole is a reality different from the sum of its parts.
about.description_3: It is important that naturalness be a determining factor throughout, from the creation of the idea of the «whole» to its embodiment. That the «small» be an organic part of the «greater» and the «greater» be a natural derivative of the «small».
about.description_4: By designing and manufacturing Depp-design products we strive to create details that complement your space, creating a subtle and concise atmosphere for both milestone events and everyday routine. After all, our lives are made up of many small events that add up to a whole.
about.text:
Depp-design philosophy exists at the intersection of aesthetics and functionality. In the era of metamodernity, excess of information and changing events, we admire things that pass through time without losing their attractiveness and gain additional charisma. Remember the historical streets of European cities, Gothic, eclectic, Baroque and many other styles are combined and exist in harmony with modern reality, and patina complements the ensemble.

Time, the main absolute judge, puts everything on its pedestals showing what is really valuable. The whole is a reality different from the sum of its parts.

It is important that naturalness be a determining factor throughout, from the creation of the idea of the "whole" to its embodiment. That the "small" be an organic part of the "greater" and the "greater" be a natural derivative of the "small".

By designing and manufacturing Depp-design products we strive to create details that complement your space, creating a subtle and concise atmosphere for both milestone events and everyday routine. After all, our lives are made up of many small events that add up to a whole.
about.title_2: DEPP-DESIGN PHILOSOPHY EXISTS AT THE INTERSECTION OF AESTHETICS AND FUNCTIONALITY. IN THE ERA OF METAMODERNITY, EXCESS OF INFORMATION AND CHANGING EVENTS, WE ADMIRE THINGS THAT PASS THROUGH TIME WITHOUT LOSING THEIR ATTRACTIVENESS AND GAIN ADDITIONAL CHARISMA.
